page.title: 13OPINIONS
page.content: The Law and Order in Brynnau is controlled from the Police Station in Llanharan.The Policemen that walk around Brynnau are called Denver Richardson and Gareth Hughes and sometimes be seen walking around their beat in Brynnau. The population in Brynnau is roughly 4000.There are 1761 people on the electoral roll.There are over 1000 houses in Brynnau. We gave out 100 questionaires and only 90 came back. Only 48 out of 100 people said they allways voted,39 people said they sometimes voted and 3 people said they never voted. Another question we asked was Do you think there should be more Law And Order in Brynnau? The answer was 76 people said YES there should be and 14 said NO there shouldn't. {BY {Susan Hughes. Aged 10
